Name: The Augury House
About the game: The Augury House is a living house filled with strange secrets and dream-like spaces. Take your time in exploring the many spaces of The Augury House, which shift every other week! Manuals are your Guide! Please read our Manual for controls, hints, and basic information about this project. The Manual will expand as new things are added to the house! For a compilation of all of the secrets of The Augury House, please read our Quick Reference Guide (aka DevHandbook)! Mystery of the Frog Let your ears guide you towards the frogs that live within the house's walls. If you are patient enough, they might let you into their deep and dark cave. Features - HUD-less design - Hidden spaces - Spatial audio - Virtual Exhibitions
Meta Title: The Augury House: Jan 26, 2022, Augury House and Full Ove...
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Augury House? Check out the release date (Jan 26, 2022), developer insights from Augury House, and a complete game summary.
